1.06.name: wordpress/wordpress-exit-box-lite
1.06.description:
WordPress Exit Box kicks-in when a visitor clicks an external link on your website, instead of just following the link and losing the visitor, your Exit Box is displayed in a jQuery Box. The content of your exit box is fully customizable, and you can design it to meet your goals.

Why Should you use Wordpress Exit Box?

  • Monetize outgoing links : Your Exit Box is a great spot to show ads, make special offers, or promote a high converting product.
  • Get more social bookmarks :Place your social bookmarking buttons on your exit page.
  • Protect your SEO score : No more SEO leaks from direct external links. Exit Box will stop these with nofollow links.
  • Display disclaimer messages : Warn your visitors that theyre about to leave your website, and offer them to chance to go back, or select another d
